## CommonOpts.cache property

If true (default), stream caches last received value and pushes it to new subscriberswhen they subscribe. If false, calling `.deref()` on this stream will always return `undefined`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cache: boolean;
```
